trans-unit.source: Represents a transformation that is a composite of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref> children in its <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en transformering som er en kombinasjon av det <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"> </xref> underordnede i den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This class is useful when grouping transformations that are applied to some objects in a scene but not others.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen er nyttig når gruppering transformeringer som er brukt noen objekter i en scene, men ikke alle.

trans-unit.source: It also allows developers to re-use transformations by defining them once and then adding them to different Transform3DGroup objects.
trans-unit.target: Det gjør det også mulig for utviklere å bruke transformeringer på nytt ved å definere dem én gang, og deretter legge dem til andre Transform3DGroup-objekter.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en samling av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: Collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Samling av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom samling.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup.Children*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup.Children*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup.Children*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup"> </xref>, gjør dype kopier av verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Når du kopierer avhengighetsegenskaper, denne metoden kopierer ressursen referanser og data bindinger (men de kan ikke løse) men ikke animasjoner eller gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> blir <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen var<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup"> </xref> objektet gjør dype kopier av gjeldende verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Refererer til ressursen, databindinger og animasjoner kopieres ikke, men er gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> blir <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen var <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the transformation is affine.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om transformeringen er affinitet.

trans-unit.source: True if the transformation is affine; false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: SANN hvis transformeringen er affinitet; False ellers.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> that indicates the current transform value.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"> </xref> som angir den gjeldende transformeringsverdien for.

trans-unit.source: Matrix3D that indicates the current transform value.
trans-unit.target: Matrix3D som angir den gjeldende transformeringsverdien for.
